title: Chad Food Inflation
description: Cost of food in Chad increased 12.40 percent in September of 2022 over the same month in the previous year. Food Inflation in Chad averaged 1.30 percent from 2009 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 21.92 percent in January of 2012 and a record low of -10.99 percent in August of 2013. This page provides - Chad Food Inflation - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Institut National de la Statistique, des Etudes Economiques et Démographiques (INSEED), Tchad
